sentences.en: Contuse . To injure without breaking the skin; bruise.
sentences.cn: 未划破皮肤地伤害; 挫伤.

sentences.en: The sports trauma not only damage their health, which contuse the enthusiasm of physical activity, but also effect normal study living, indeed the suffering of mentally and physical.
sentences.cn: 学生在运动中受了伤，不仅损害健康，挫伤体育活动的积极性，而且影响正常的生活、学习，甚至给学生造成生理和心理上的痛苦。

trans.tran_cn: 打伤, 挫伤, 撞伤
trans.tran_en: to injure (the body) without breaking the skin; bruise
